testmod.ponder.cogwheel.text_1: Cogwheels will relay rotation to other adjacent cogwheels
testmod.ponder.cogwheel.text_2: Neighbouring shafts connected like this will rotate in opposite directions
testmod.ponder.cog_speedup.text_1: Large and Small cogs can be connected diagonally
testmod.ponder.cog_speedup.text_2: Shifting from large to small cogs, the conveyed speed will be doubled
testmod.ponder.cog_speedup.text_3: Shifting the opposite way, the conveyed speed will be halved
testmod.ponder.large_cogwheel.header: Relaying rotational force using Large Cogwheels
testmod.ponder.large_cogwheel.text_1: Large cogwheels can connect to each other at right angles
testmod.ponder.large_cogwheel.text_2: It will help relaying conveyed speed to other axes of rotation
